You should not share any information with any body or any user. The detail you provide us must be true and correct and up to date and it\'s should not be false or misleading. Your details will be safe with us and we will not share your details any third parties.We can collect information when you create an account such as your contact details, content you create, and your location. We also collect information contained in the messages you send through our Platform and information from your phone book, if you grant us access to your phone book on your mobile device.We also collect information with your permission such as age, language,email, phone number, Your username, social media account information, and profile image, comments, photographs, videos, and your post. Payment information, such as bank name, ifsc code, bank branch, other third-party payment information, phone and social network contacts, with your permission. If you choose to find other users through your phone contacts, we will access and collect the names and phone numbers and match that information against existing users of the Platform. If you choose to find other users through your social network contacts, we will collect your public profile information as well as names and profiles of your social contacts. Information to verify an account such as a form of identification, Information you share through surveys or your participation in challenges, or contests.We collect certain information from you when you use the Platform, including your IP address, location-related data, unique device identifiers, browsing history, Cookies, your mobile carrier, time zone setting, and mobile or device information, operating system, app and file names and types, and platform. We collect data to provide you with best services and your data will be safe with us and we will share your data only for advertisement and for any future legal matter.

Scroll status is for all 13+ age group, so please be careful while post, comment or don\'t misuse this platform, else your account will be suspend. Scroll status prohibits sexually adult contents, self harming or harming to any creature of God, any type of discrimination, defaming any body, any illegal contents, any copyright violations, any misleading and false contents, any disturbing or not appropriate for society contents.
